TopicTitle: Ability to place stuff radially on the walls of cargo bay

Articles.Content: Just let us place solar panels on the inside walls that open on the mk2 cargo bay like how the shuttle was.
yes. I planned on putting solar panels there for my sstos but nope
Those were radiators, not solar panels on the shuttle bay doors.

Those were radiators, not solar panels on the shuttle bay doors.

Well still it would be nice if you could place stuff there.

Well still it would be nice if you could place stuff there.

Gigantigor panels would fit the bill.
